attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: You are probably wondering whether or not you should get the app. But as you see from my one star rating...you shouldnâ€™t. It took close to a year to download before it decided to. But it even had a few glitches that I wasnâ€™t looking forward to. And it decided to offer me to buy some spaghetti. But I was like I donâ€™t want no spaghett!!! So tell me why this stuff was sent in the mail the next day. But it took close to a year for the app to downloadğŸ˜‘! I was not amused. I would have toğŸ˜©ğŸ˜© only if the spaghetti didnâ€™t come in the mail! I want warm spaghetti next time. NOT COLD AND MOLDY!!!

attributes.title: Canâ€™t Believe This!!
attributes.review: This app was so incredibly stressful for me. I downloaded it hoping to get and show support for the president. Instead, I couldnâ€™t figure it out, it kept glitching, and had me so stressed out that it gave me a UTI!! You know what a UTI is? Itâ€™s a URINARY TRACT INFECTION!!!! I had to go out in a MASK and get antibiotics and explain SHAMEFULLY to a pharmacist that the Trump 2020 app gave me an infection in my private parts. Then I only got given so much because healthcare made it too expensive for my young entrepreneurial free souled self. Turns out, if I donâ€™t take enough antibiotics, I could DIE!!! Itâ€™s true, I learned it on Google, my doctor...Worst experience ever. Would NEVER recommend this app.... Everyone go give it ONE STAR. My name is Generation Z and Iâ€™m here to take this app down.ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜ª

attributes.title: omg
attributes.review:
a literal douchbag. 
this app is horrible! my brother and i had nothing to do today so we sat under a tree. then i saw that donald trump had an app and i thought â€œFerb! I know what weâ€™re going to do todayâ€ we were going to build a machine that gets trump out of office. mean while, my secret agent platypus(perry) was trying to stop the evil dr. doofenschmirtz from making a make-me-president-inator. as we were making out machine, our friends came over to help, along with the girl scouts because girl power. periodt. overall, our machine worked and Dr. Doofenschmirtz inator did NOT work. the end. 

if only that could happen. the moral of the story is that trump cannot ban tik tok and should not be in office, and the electoral college should be abolished. THE END.  
have a great day :)

attributes.title: I Expected Much Better...
attributes.review: I was downloading this app to support the best president ever (in my opinion). When the app finally downloaded (it took about 2 hours because my WiFi is awful), the app wasnâ€™t opening. I went to check my other apps to make sure that my iPhone wasnâ€™t the problem, it wasnâ€™t. I shut off my phone completely and turned it back on to then realize that it, fortunately, opened. Although, I was soon greeted with ads and glitches in the app and it was honestly difficult to maneuver. The application slowed my phone immensely and I was really disappointed to see that my favorite president had such an awful app. Iâ€™ll make sure to never download this again. Please do better, please....

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER DO NOT INSTALL
attributes.review: this app is awful i downloaded it and once i got onto the app it said their fish were gonna steal my microwave if i didnâ€™t send them 2 million dollars. i obviously donâ€™t have that much money so i couldnâ€™t. i went on with my day figuring it was just a scam or something and then i go into my house later that day and not only is my microwave gone but they stole my toilet, sink, fridge, curtains, light bulbs, all the doors, and all of the ice cubes. i do not recommend getting this app under any circumstances. i repeat, DO NOT GET THIS APP unless you want government fish breaking into your house and stealing your microwave, toilet, sink, fridge, curtains, light bulbs, all the doors in your house, and all of the ice cubes. i wouldnâ€™t even recommend this app to my worst enemy.
